Package gamelogic.game

Class GameMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.game.GameMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game, java.lang.Runnable
    public class GameMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game, java.lang.Runnable
    Class for maintaining the Pentago game. Module 2 Project 2022 University of Twente

        public GameMethod​(Player p1,
                  Player p2,
                  java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock lock,

                  java.lang.Object... object)
        Creates a GameMethod Object with a couple of objects.
        Parameters:
        p1 - player 1
        p2 - player 2
        lock - locks the board to do the signal
        signalBoard - tells the user whether to signal the board or not
        object - miscellaneous for gameHandler specifics

        public void startGame()
        Starts the Pentago game. Continues until either the board has a winner or the board is full
